Articles.Content:
So sorry for the blank title, but I'm having so many problems with adding EVE and Scatterer to my Mod. I've asked many people, including the Kopernicus Discord, with little help. I've DMed noteable people to no avail

When the game is booted, the main menu works

But actually in game the terminator is completely broken

So far, i've:

Fiddled with both usesCloudIntegration in planetsList and EVEIntegration_preserveCloudColors in Kerbin's atmo .cfg.

Dug in other visual mods to take configs, clouds, .halfs to test (these are removed, don't get yer angery because im steal because ive deleted them)

Remade my .raws/.halfs

Fiddled with numbers

Please help, I'm trying to get an alpha version of my mod out by the end of the month. I've hit enough brick walls now and i want to just get the mod out.

Edited August 24, 2019 by "Our Benefactors"
